title: anandhamaya manavE
sahitya:
Anandamaya manavE O manasA

anupallavi

 AnandamanavE nityAnanda manavE sadAnanda manavE siddhAnta manavE brahmm-

caraNam 1

 ajnAnamagu yavivEkamula drunci sujnAna mayamagu sUkSma merunguTE 
dEhalOka shAstrAdi vAsa nala sAhasamuna kOsi sangamula taluTE
 
caraNam 2

 bhEda buddhini bahu vAdamu sEyaka modakhEdamu landu sama bhAvamuncuTE 
vEdAtItulai velayu sadgurulacE nAdamu vinucunu AhlAda monduTE
 
caraNam 3

 jnAna svarUpamai kaivalyamai shuddha svAnubhavampaina sAyujya monduTE 
rAmacandrapura varulagu vEnkaTaramaNa bhAgavata varaduni vinOdamu
